title: Racing teams of NASCAR ranked by revenue 2017
summary: The Racing teams in the ranked by was Teams Joe_Gibbs_Racing , who made 180 million .
The most teams was Roush_Fenway_Racing , with just 19 million .

In second place was Teams Richard_Childress_Racing with 145 million ; third place went to Teams Hendrick_Motorsports with 180 million ; fourth place went to Teams Front_Row_Motorsports with 19 million and fifth place went to Teams Stewart-Haas_Racing , who was 109 million .
gold: The statistic ranks the racing teams of NASCAR according to revenue in 2017 . Hendrick Motorsports generated 180 million U.S. dollars in revenue in 2017 .
